scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mumbai && graph deploy --product hosted-service dolomite-exchange/dolomite-v2
scripts.deploy:matic: yarn prepare:mumbai && graph deploy --product hosted-service dolomite-exchange/dolomite-v2-matic
scripts.deploy:mumbai: yarn prepare:mumbai && graph deploy --product hosted-service dolomite-exchange/dolomite-v2-mumbai
